name: activity_type
description: Type of activity (user_login, record_created, report_generated, etc.)

name: user_count
description: Number of active users at this time

name: data_volume_mb
description: Volume of data processed in megabytes

name: feature_usage
description: JSON string mapping features to usage counts

name: module_name
description: Module or feature area (employees, payroll, attendance, etc.)

name: avg_response_time_ms
description: Average response time for requests in this period

name: billing_cycle_day
description: Day of the month for billing cycle (1-31)

name: storage_used_gb
description: Total storage used by tenant in gigabytes

name: peak_concurrent_users
description: Peak number of concurrent users in the period

name: total_employees
description: Total number of employees in the system
